name: Waterun
description:
WATERUN

Mobile (temporarily only for windows) runner with rock-paper-scissors gameplay!

This game is about thieves whose robbery did not go according to plan. They knocked through the vault... and broke an outer wall... in underwater city! Run for your life! And don't let those corporate security stop you!

Сhoose your weapon wisely. For example, to fight enemy spearman or archer, firstly, you have to block their attack. Each weapon has its own attack range. Character attacks automatically according to his weapon.

Controls:

Sword - 1

Spear - 2

Hammer - 3

Bow - 4

Shield - SPACE

Or pick needed weapon with your mouse (LMB)
